content:
# The inventory now contains 5 coal, and the stone furnace has been placed at the specified position. 
# However, the furnace is currently reporting "NO_INGREDIENTS," indicating that it does not have any iron ore to smelt into iron plates.

# Step 12: Insert iron ore into the furnace to begin the smelting process.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 iron ore into the furnace

# Step 13: Check the status of the furnace after inserting the iron ore.
print(f"Entities on the map after inserting iron ore: {get_entities()}")  # Check the status of the furnace again
print(f"Inventory after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory again
